name: @comethq/comet-sdk
description: The Typescript SDK for Comet, a DEX aggregator on NEAR.

scripts.build: rm -fr dist/ && tsc -P tsconfig.build.json && tsc -P tsconfig.esm.json
scripts.build:contract: RUSTFLAGS='-C link-arg=-s' cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release && cp ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/*.wasm ./compiled_contracts/

author: Shardul Aeer
